Thank you for purchasing Buckets!

Below is your Buckets v1 License. You should also receive an email with this information. To use the license:

  1. Open the Buckets application (download at www.budgetwithbuckets.com)
  2. Click the "Trial Version" menu
  3. Click "Enter License..."
  4. Copy and paste the following license into the box
  5. Click the button


  

    This license may be used on any number of computers belonging to you and your immediate family members living in your home.
  


  

    Happy budgeting!
